```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets) # install.packages('googlesheets')
library(knitr)

## setup for our googlesheet
#gs_auth(new_user = TRUE) ## authorize googledocs -- requires user interaction with default browser
gsheet_url <- 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13LjFY4xOgbttcccbn-tkbtb6pnij-AOWwnCDuI4VUjw/edit#gid=0'

## read in googlesheet
gs <- gs_url(gsheet_url) %>%
  gs_read()
# head(gs)

knitr::kable(gs)

```
